course_description: Examines the pedagogical and theological significance of human imagination and creativity. A variety of creative or artistic activities are studied, experimented with, and reflected upon during the course. Students learn to use creative media in informed and critical ways to enhance the educational dimensions of their ministry.
sections: Class Nbr: 6195, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 2-5p, Instructor: A. Valdez Barker, Status: Open
